meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1738.

td.p: April McManus, a senior from Woodbury, Minnesota
Rob Marus, a junior from Little Rock, Arkansas
Pat Gavin, a sophomore from Kingston, Massachusetts

tr.td: THE CONSTITUTION
RAPPERS
HINTS FROM HELOISE
WOMEN AUTHORS
RIVERS
"T" TIME
(Alex: Notice "T" in quotation marks.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_4', 'clue_J_6_4_stuck', '(Pat: What\'s a baby goose?) [breaks down laughing.][Other players join in.]
(Alex: That\'s funny, Pat. But remember it\'s "T" Time, "baby goose" does not begin with the letter T.)
[Bell sounds.]
(Alex: [*]. Vidkun Quisling was a [*] in the second World War. Pat, can you regain your composure enough to select again?)

traitor

Pat
Triple Stumper
')
